description:
Works with any Excel version!

Would you like to be a professional office worker? Work like a pro?
Learn how to save your job with the 5 best practice Excel tricks professionals use every day! If you know the basics and how to actually do them, the next step towards a better job will be only a matter of time!

This course contains downloadable xlsx-files attached to the lectures containing the formulas and data shown in the videos!

What you will learn

  • The basic way to bring data together
  • Why conditional background colors are so cool
  • Sum up parts of data under a certain condition (sounds complicated, but it's not!)
  • Compare two tables - line by line - but in a second
  • Why so many people use pivot tables


30 day full refund policy + no questions asked! (If bought via Udemy website. If you bought the course via App and are not satisfied, please contact me directly.)
title: These 5 Excel Tricks Will Save Your Job
